thread.title: Cobb County woman arrested for harassing emails
thread.title_full: Cobb County woman arrested for harassing emails | www.ajc.com

author: Dan Klepal
title: Cobb County woman arrested for harassing emails
text:
An East Cobb woman, whose front-yard fence was set on fire in the middle of the night just days after filing a complaint with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission over Cobb’s deal to build a new Braves stadium has been arrested Tuesday for harassing communications.
Susan McCoy has been emailing Attorney General Sam Olens, former Cobb Commission Chairman, and accusing specific individuals of setting the fire. McCoy’s emails, at least some of which were also sent to The Atlanta Journal-Constitution, implied that Olens would not pursue a case against the people McCoy suspected because he was friends with them.
Read more later on MyAJC.com
